english.segment1: I will not forget the day when the sides were chosen. Me against me against..me. Clothing so drenched with sweat. and the teeth they were clenched. Who can I trust when I..
english.segment2: Grabbed hold my enemy's neck. and choked 'till he ceased. Blistered with disbelief I awake dead. And when I awoke I couldn't believe it was me. All the time it was me
english.segment3: So many times we smile in pride. Putting such faith in what we've accomplished. But minutes ago we were (minutes ago we were). Slitting our wrists, running for sympathy
